articles.title: ESA - BepiColombo's third Mercury flyby: the movie - European Space Agency
articles.description: Watch Mercury appear from the shadows as the ESA/JAXA BepiColombo spacecraft sped by the planet’s night side during its 19 June 2023 close flyby, and enjoy a special flyover of geologically rich terrain, along with a bonus 3D scene.
articles.content:
Science & Exploration22/06/20231339 views13 likes
